security: The document is marked 'For Official Use Only' and contains a protective marking that is excluded from automatic termination, indicating that some information is considered sensitive.
summary: This document is an identification form and exhibit cover sheet related to Robert Scheer, detailing items obtained from him during an interview by the 115th INTC Group (I) on October 11, 1966, including articles and campaign materials.
summary_one_paragraph: This document, dated August 24, 1998, is a JFK Assassination System Identification Form and exhibit cover sheet. Originating from CSF/INSCOM, it pertains to Robert Scheer and lists items obtained from him during a 115th INTC Group (I) interview on October 11, 1966. These items, identified as Exhibits I, II, III, IV, and V, include Robert Scheer's article 'How the United States Got Involved in Vietnam,' a 'Ramparts Vietnam Primer,' and various pieces of Scheer's campaign material for Congress. The document notes that the exhibits are indexed separately and includes markings indicating it is 'For Official Use Only'.
title: [RESTRICTED]
